# Navigation & Selection Tools

The **navigation and selection tools** provide essential functionality for navigating the workspace and interacting with annotations. These tools allow you to quickly move around the image, select existing annotations, and reposition them without modifying their size or shape.

## Pan & Move Scene Tool

The **Pan & Move Scene Tool** **`(1)`** enables users to quickly navigate around the image without modifying any existing annotations. It is essential for working with large images or zoomed-in details.

**Just drag the mouse** in any direction to move around the scene.

***

## Select Figure

The **Select Figure Tool `(2)`** allows you to select and modify existing annotations. Itâ€™s essential for refining objects, making adjustments, or accessing properties for any annotated figure in the labeling toolbox.

**Click** on any annotation to select it. Once selected, you can rotate or adjust the annotation using the control points or settings panel.

**Pro Tip:** Hold down the `Shift` key to select multiple figures simultaneously.

| Action                  | Hotkey                                      |
| ----------------------- | ------------------------------------------- |
| Select a figure         | `Left Mouse Click`                          |
| Select multiple figures | `Hold Left Mouse Button` or `Shift + Click` |

| Scene Navigation                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |

## Drag Figure&#x20;

The **Drag Figure Tool** **`(3)`** allows you to reposition annotations without altering their size or shape. This is particularly useful for fine-tuning the placement of your annotations to ensure they are accurately aligned with the objects in the image.

**Click and hold** the **left mouse button** on the selected annotation. Then **drag the figure** to the desired position without changing its dimensions
